mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, email, phone, career, regdate) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{career}, now())
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, career=#{career} where username=#{username}
mapper.delete: delete from fav where user_id=#{userId} and board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.select: select * from fav where user_id=#{userId} and board_id=#{boardId}
select cboard.id, cboard.title, cboard.content, cboard.regdate, cboard.user_id from cboard inner join (select * from fav where user_id=#{userId}) as favhistory where cboard.id = favhistory.board_id
